column2: Senmiao Technology Ltd. is a holding company, which facilitate automobile transaction and related services focusing on the ride-hailing industry. The company is headquartered in Chengdu, Sichuan and currently employs 139 full-time employees. The firm with its subsidiaries mainly offers access to credit to borrowers and creditors and attractive investment returns for investors. The firm mainly offered two types of products: standard loans and assignment of loans, providing qualified borrowers with access to affordable credit and creditors to assign their existing loans for more liquidity. The Company’s operating platform is Aihongsen and others. The Company’s main subsidiaries include Sichuan Senmiao Zecheng Business Consulting Co., Ltd., Sichuan Senmiao Ronglian Technology Co., Ltd. and others.
